4.eng-name: The Book of Ghusl and Tayammum

hadiths.text: Umm Hani' narrated that she entered upon the Prophet (ﷺ) on the day of the Conquest of Makkah, when he was performing Ghusl - while a garment was screening him - from a vessel in which were traces of dough. She said:He prayed Ad-Duha - but I do not know how many Rak'ahs he prayed - after he finished Ghusl

chapter.ara-name: باب الاِغْتِسَالِ فِي قَصْعَةٍ فِيهَا أَثَرُ الْعَجِينِ
chapter.eng-name: Performing Ghusl From A Bowl In Which There Are Traces Of Dough
